name: Jumpy Hare
description:
In Jumpy Hare, you play as a hare which is desperately trying to escape the big city. Jump over the obstacles, and see how many of them you can avoid.

Jumpy Hare is designed for mobile play.
This is primarily for testing, so any feedback is highly appreciated !

//Controls
Hold space/mouse to jump
Navigate menu with the mouse
R to reset the highscore

//Current version 1.04

//Credits
Art: Juliette Cazes
Music: Pedro Araujo
Code: Benjamin Ejlertsen / CodesharkStudios
